name: Trello
description: Retrieves boards, lists and cards, and allows you to search in Trello.
introductoryText:
![Trello](data:image/png;base64,)
### Trello connector
#### Retrieves boards, lists, cards, checklists, items and allows you to search in Trello.
#### Setup required : obtain the API-key and generate a API token from [Trello](https://trello.com/power-ups/admin/) by creating a new power up

options.name: apiKey
options.title: API Key
options.description: Obtain it from Trello by creating a new power up https://trello.com/power-ups/admin/

options.name: apiToken
options.title: API Token
options.description: Obtain it from Trello admin UI

options.name: workspaceID
options.title: Retrieve boards for this Workspace ID
options.description: Take it from the Trello workspace URL, e.g. https://trello.com/w/[YourWorkspaceID]

options.name: boardID
options.title: Retrieve lists for this board ID

options.name: listID
options.title: Retrieve cards for this list ID
options.description: if specified, all issues for this project will be retrieved

options.name: cardID
options.title: Retrieve checklists for this card ID

options.name: checklistID
options.title: Retrieves items for the checklist ID

blockOutputs.label: Boards
blockOutputs.tooltip: the Trello boards for the workspace

blockOutputs.label: Lists
blockOutputs.tooltip: the Trello lists for the specified board

blockOutputs.label: Cards
blockOutputs.tooltip: the Trello cards for the specified list

blockOutputs.label: Checklists
blockOutputs.tooltip: the checklists for the specified card

blockOutputs.label: Items
blockOutputs.tooltip: the items for the specified checklist

blockOutputs.label: Search results
blockOutputs.tooltip: the results of the search on Trello.
